overview:
Jake Massey is an expert in data and data visualization.

He has worked for many organizations as a consultant and has been an entrepreneur his entire life. Currently he is founder and CTO of IdeaString.com, a collaboration platform aimed at helping organizations innovate in areas of business process optimization and new product development.

He has designed and developed databases that support hundreds of terabytes and provide sub-second responses to real-time queries. He has expertise in Oracle, SQL Server, DB2, Sybase, Casandra, and MongoDB.

In addition to being a seasoned expert in data and databases, he also has expertise in .NET, C# specifically. He has designed, created, and deployed internet and intranet facing applications that support hundreds of thousands of simultaneous users.

He currently resides in Atlanta, Georgia.
